original_text:
It hurls at him without pity;
    he flees from its power in headlong flight.
korean_text: 하나님은 그를 아끼지 아니하시고 던져 버릴 것이니 그의 손에서 도망치려고 힘쓰리라

sentences.original_text: It hurls at him without pity
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그를 향해 가차 없이 던진다.

sentences.original_text: he flees from its power in headlong flight.
